name: Optimizely Snippet Embedder
author: Michael Kjeldsen

sections.description:
This plugin let’s you easily add the Optimizely Project script to all your WordPress pages. Simply copy/paste the snippet ID from the experiment on optimizely.com into the input field, save settings and you’re up and running.

Yes, it’s as easy as that.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the downloaded plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add your Optimizely Snippet ID to the settings page and hit “Save settings”.
  4. PROFIT!
sections.faq:
Is this plugin really free to use?

Yes it is – absolutely free! (But unfortunately Optimizely itself might cost you a few bucks).

Who did that spledid looking icon?

The plugin icon is from the Kameleon Free Pack by Webalys.

short_description: Easily add the Optimizely script on your website.
description:
This plugin let’s you easily add the Optimizely Project script to all your WordPress pages. Simply copy/paste the snippet ID from the experiment on optimizely.com into the input field, save settings and you’re up and running.

Yes, it’s as easy as that.

upgrade_notice.1.1.4: This upgrade is purely a clean-up of unused files. No update required (although you are perfectly free to do so!)
upgrade_notice.1.1.3: Added admin notice the make sure users remember to add their Optimizely Project Snippet ID.
upgrade_notice.1.1.1: Added extended security for not interfering with other plugins.
upgrade_notice.1.0.1: It's now possible p√• change the Project Snippet ID as needed.
upgrade_notice.1.0.0: First stable version. Upgrading is highly recommended.

screenshots.caption: Input screen with an example of an Optimizely Project Snippet ID inserted. Yup, that's just about it.
